message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think it's a great fit for you, and I'm willing to let it go for $120.
I'm really interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. Can you meet me there?
I understand where you're coming from, Bob, but I'm not quite comfortable with $90. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer $110. Can you consider that?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I was thinking more like $95. Can you see if you can do that?
I'm getting close, Bob! I can see that we're almost there. I'm willing to go up to $105, but that's as high as I can go. Can you meet me there?
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I can do $98, that's the best I can do. Can you meet me there?
I understand that you're trying to stay within your budget, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. I can offer you the product for $102, but that's as low as I can go. Can you consider that?
I really like the product, but I'm still a bit short. I can do $99, that's my final offer. Can you meet me there?
